articles.title: How We Bind Data From Exchanges to Build Efficient Trading Applications
articles.baseline: High performance and result-driven strategies are a must-have in trading as you need to quickly respond to rapid crypto price fluctuations. We support our trading applications with a CryptoGateway application shell that provides instant access to market data from various exchanges in a uniform manner.

articles.title: Blockchain Technology for Smarter and Safer Logistics and Transportation
articles.baseline: Blockchain is transforming industries by solving some of the decades-old issues that were halting progress. In logistics and transportation blockchain technology is increasing efficiency, decreasing costs, and enhancing end-user experience.

articles.title: How Can Gold Tokenization Transform the Financial Industry?
articles.baseline: Tokenization can radically transform the way we invest in assets, encouraging the creation of a more inclusive financial system. With the help of blockchain technology, it’s possible to tokenize almost everything, from real estate to precious metals and even works of art.

slideCases.name: Doctime
slideCases.title: Medical Appointment Scheduling Platform
slideCases.description: Doctime is a web-based online scheduling platform that allows medical centers to manage their schedule and implement loyalty programs, and patients to easily make appointments and receive discounts.

slideCases.name: FootballNet
slideCases.title: Blockchain-Based Football Fan Loyalty Application
slideCases.description: Soccer and football industry contributors asked PixelPlex to build a system for personalized fan experience. The delivered solution helped reach a whopping revenue and engage top-class club partners.

slideCases.name: BMW
slideCases.title: IoT Solution with Web and Mobile App for BMW
slideCases.description: A smart iBeacon-enabled solution for enterprise data management and efficient communication between dealer showroom visitors, car owners, and BMW employees.

slideCases.name: NotaryLedger
slideCases.title: Intuitive Blockchain Document Notarization Solution
slideCases.description: White-label permissioned blockchain software that digitizes powers of attorney and enables the principals to manage authorizations in favor of representatives allowing them to act on their behalf.

slideCases.name: ProPool
slideCases.title: Multicoin Cryptocurrency Mining Pool
slideCases.description: ProPool is a high performance multipool which provides the highest level of mining efficiency through merged mining, algorithm auto-switching, and mined coins arbitrage. High mining profitability, an advanced feature set and professional UX/UI makes ProPool the best in its class.

slideCases.name: Qtum
slideCases.title: UTXO-Based Blockchain and DApp Development Platform
slideCases.description: Qtum is a UTXO-based blockchain with a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus model, smart contract support and unified environment for DApp development. Its core technology combines the security of UTXO model, the robustness of Bitcoin core architecture with account abstraction layer.

slideCases.name: Green Hypermarket
slideCases.title: Digital Transformation for Grocery Store Chain in 8 Weeks
slideCases.description: In just 8 weeks, we’ve built a comprehensive multi-platform eCommerce and retail ecosystem. The platform enables engaging online shopping, IoT supply chain management, and Uber-like delivery.

slideCases.name: Scargos
slideCases.title: Logistics Solution for Shippers, Carriers, and Drivers
slideCases.description: From scratch, PixelPlex has developed a full-cycle logistics web app for shippers and drivers to simplify freight loads booking, GPS-track products transportation, and streamline carrier offers acceptance.

slideCases.name: WaterWORX
slideCases.title: IoT Solution for Water Hauling Process Management
slideCases.description: A comprehensive sensor-rich system for streamlined low-risk water hauling process governance.

slideCases.name: Blockverify
slideCases.title: Blockchain Supply Chain and Anti-Counterfeit Solution
slideCases.description: Blockchain supply chain management solution with a built-in mechanism for counterfeit goods identification and brand protection.

slideCases.name: DDrive
slideCases.title: Blockchain Car Sharing Services & Automotive Supply Chain System
slideCases.description: Enterprise blockchain system supporting data integrity for the automotive supply chain, transparent vehicle maintenance, and streamlined car-sharing services.

slideCases.name: Flact
slideCases.title: Hyperledger-Based Solution for Multi-Signature Document Flow Management
slideCases.description: Permissioned blockchain document management platform that enables executives and shareholders to vote and pass resolutions within one web application.

slideCases.name: Bridge
slideCases.title: Browser Extension to Connect DApps with the Blockchain Platform
slideCases.description: Chrome & Firefox extension for running Echo blockchain-based DApps and making transactions from multiple wallet accounts.

slideCases.name: Obito
slideCases.title: Asset Tokenization Platform
slideCases.description: Asset tokenization and smart contract platform based on Bitcoin Cash enabling ownership, OTC trading, and compliance

slideCases.name: VResorts
slideCases.title: Oculus Go VR Hospitality Virtual Tour Solution
slideCases.description: VR platform for hotel & resort owners, and tour agents to showcase locations in 360° virtual tours with the Oculus Go headset.

slideCases.name: ProCoffee
slideCases.title: Mobile Application for Ordering Coffee Online
slideCases.description: PixelPlex has developed a mobile app for coffee drinkers and baristas. It enables customers to order coffee and pay for it online, make deposits and participate in loyalty programs

slideCases.name: Resorts STO
slideCases.title: Security Token Offering Platform and Ecosystem
slideCases.description: STO platform that supports the whole life-cycle of security token offering processes. The platform makes it possible to easily digitize shares and turn them into Ethereum security tokens. All records about the investors and their tokens are safely stored within the smart contract, which excludes any risk of fraud.

slideCases.name: Blip
slideCases.title: Multi-Currency Desktop Wallet
slideCases.description: The Echo blockchain-based multi-currency desktop wallet with multiple account management and local key storage. Custom design & development.

slideCases.name: QTS
slideCases.title: VR Real Estate Platform for generating 360° Virtual Tours
slideCases.description: VR real estate platform for realtors to showcase and present properties to homebuyers via 360° virtual tours. iPad app for photographers.

slideCases.name: Arbitrage Bot
slideCases.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Platform and Arbitrage
slideCases.description: Cryptocurrency trading platform supporting multiple arbitrage opportunities, trading bot functionality and liquidity management. Interacting directly with exchanges, Arbitrage bot places purchase or sale orders on the trader’s behalf, allowing much faster trading.

slideCases.name: Kaikas
slideCases.title: Browser Extension for Running DApps
slideCases.description: Chrome, Firefox and Opera browser extension for running DApps, authorizing and sending transactions, and managing your online wallet.

slideCases.name: Smart Mall
slideCases.title: Smart Retail Solution Powered by AI & iBeacon Technology
slideCases.description: An iBeacon-powered retail platform for an IoT company’s customer shopping experience tracking and data collection, analytics and management upon AI algorithms.

slideCases.name: HelmBet RPS
slideCases.title: Rock Paper Scissors Blockchain Game for Desktop
slideCases.description: Provably fair, blockchain-based Rock Paper Scissors game for Windows & macOS, powered by Peerplays decentralized global betting platform and blazing-fast Graphene protocol.

slideCases.name: FunShape
slideCases.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange for Novice Traders
slideCases.description: Crypto exchange platform providing a highly convenient UI/UX for on-the-go, fast trading. FunShape supports 10 trading pairs and offers 2FA authentication. It also has a simple and convenient admin panel for viewing reports, setting fees and user profile management.

slideCases.name: Blockcerts
slideCases.title: Blockchain-Based Digital Document Verification System
slideCases.description: Blockchain-based token platform for creating, issuing, viewing, and auditing digital documents in Ethereum smart contract ecosystem. The solution is based on a decentralized blockchain ledger with strong cryptography. Safety and security are ensured by smart contracts embedded in the system.

slideCases.name: Miniwager
slideCases.title: Ethereum-Based Decentralized Online Gaming Platform
slideCases.description: An Ethereum-based decentralized casual gaming platform used for PvP gameplay and tournaments. Users are provided with a way to play casual games online, having the opportunity to place wagers on outcomes in ETH. The platform borrows the best features from top casual web games.

slideCases.name: MyBIT
slideCases.title: Decentralized Asset Management and Investment Platform
slideCases.description: PixelPlex provided blockchain development services and assisted in MyBIT’s ICO campaign. We’ve created a modern ICO website with rich functionality and seamless UI/UX. Mobile wallets both for Android and iOS devices allowing users to store and maintain their MYB tokens were also part of development.

slideCases.name: Bitnetwork
slideCases.title: Cryptocurrency Exchange for Professional Traders
slideCases.description: The platform’s web and mobile apps have customizable trading UI templates allowing the user to pull out and set up the trading modules they need in a format that is convenient for them. Over 20 trading modules are customizable as well, so the user can individually configure each module by style and display.

slideCases.name: VRCHIVE
slideCases.title: Virtual Reality 360° Image Sharing Platform
slideCases.description: Content distribution platform for VR creators and enthusiasts, which allows to store, view and share 360-degree photos of the real and virtual world.

slideCases.name: Linkspace
slideCases.title: Instagram Influencer Marketing Platform
slideCases.description: Influencer marketing platform for making promotions on Instagram by inserting a unique link to a previously generated companion page in influencer’s bio section.
